meta.title: Complete Algorithmic Trading Masterclass - Zero to Profitable Trading Systems
meta.description: The most comprehensive 12-month algorithmic trading program. From zero knowledge to building automated trading systems. Master Python, financial markets, quantitative analysis, trading strategies, backtesting, risk management, and live trading deployment.
meta.level: Complete Beginner to Professional Quant Trader

program_overview.title: Complete Algorithmic Trading Masterclass
program_overview.tagline: From Manual Trading to Fully Automated Profitable Systems
program_overview.description:
This is not just a trading course—it's a complete transformation into a quantitative trader and algorithmic trading professional. Whether you're a complete beginner, manual trader wanting to automate, developer entering finance, or finance professional wanting quantitative skills, this 12-month masterclass will turn you into a skilled algorithmic trader capable of designing, backtesting, optimizing, and deploying profitable automated trading systems.

You'll master algorithmic trading from ground zero to professional level: from financial markets basics to advanced quantitative strategies, from Python programming to machine learning models, from paper trading to live automated execution, from single strategies to portfolio management. By the end, you'll have built 40+ trading strategies, backtested extensively, and deployed live trading systems with proper risk management.
what_makes_this_different: Starts from absolute zero - no trading or coding background needed
Python for trading taught from scratch
Real market data and live trading experience
Covers stocks, forex, crypto, commodities, options
Backtesting on 10+ years of historical data
Live trading deployment with real money guidance

learning_path.phase_1: Foundation (Months 1-3): Markets, Python, Data Analysis, Technical Analysis
learning_path.phase_2: Strategy Development (Months 4-6): Trading Strategies, Backtesting, Optimization
learning_path.phase_3: Advanced Quant (Months 7-9): ML Trading, Advanced Strategies, Portfolio Management
learning_path.phase_4: Professional Trading (Months 10-12): Live Trading, HFT, Fund Management, Career

phase_1_foundation.title: PHASE 1: Financial Markets & Trading Foundations (Months 1-3, Weeks 1-13)
phase_1_foundation.description: Build solid understanding of financial markets, instruments, Python programming, and data analysis for trading.

week_1_2.title: Introduction to Financial Markets
topics: Financial markets overview: stocks, forex, crypto, commodities
Stock market basics: exchanges, indices, sectors
Understanding stocks: equity, shares, market cap
How stock prices move: supply and demand
Market participants: retail, institutional, market makers
Order types: market, limit, stop-loss, stop-limit
Forex market: currency pairs, pips, lots
week_1_2.practice: Paper trade 20 manual trades, document everything

week_3_4.title: Python Programming for Trading - Part 1
topics: Lists, tuples, dictionaries for market data
Control flow: if-else for trading conditions
Loops for iterating through historical data
projects: Load and explore stock price data
week_3_4.practice: Solve 50 Python problems focused on financial data

week_5_6.title: Financial Data Analysis with Python
topics: Data sources: Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage, Quandl
OHLCV data: Open, High, Low, Close, Volume
Handling missing data in time series
Calculating returns: simple and log returns

week_7_8.title: Technical Analysis Foundations
topics: Chart patterns: head and shoulders, triangles, flags

week_9_10.title: Object-Oriented Programming for Trading Systems
topics: Data handler class for market data
week_9_10.practice: Refactor all previous code using OOP

week_13.title: Fundamental Analysis & Market Data APIs
topics: Financial statements: P&L, balance sheet, cash flow
Key ratios: P/E, P/B, ROE, debt-to-equity
Broker APIs: Interactive Brokers, Zerodha, Alpaca
Database setup for storing market data
projects: PHASE 1 MINI CAPSTONE: Complete Market Analysis Platform
week_13.assessment: Phase 1 Exam - Markets, Python, Data Analysis, Technical Analysis

phase_2_frontend_mastery.title: PHASE 2: Trading Strategies & Backtesting (Months 4-6, Weeks 14-26)
phase_2_frontend_mastery.description: Master strategy development, backtesting frameworks, optimization, and strategy evaluation.

week_27_28.title: Backtesting Framework Development
topics: What is backtesting? Importance and limitations

week_35.title: Options Trading Strategies (Basics)
topics: Options basics: calls, puts, strikes, expiry
Option Greeks: Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega
Bull call spread and bear put spread

week_38_39.title: Risk Management & Position Sizing
topics: Position sizing methods: fixed, percentage, volatility-based
week_38_39.practice: Add risk management to all strategies

week_44.title: Phase 2 Capstone Project
projects: PHASE 2 CAPSTONE: Complete Algorithmic Trading System
Requirements: 5+ strategies, backtested on 5+ years data, optimized, risk-managed, documented
Option 3: Crypto trading bot with multiple strategies
week_44.assessment: Phase 2 Exam - Strategy development, backtesting, optimization

phase_3_backend_engineering.title: PHASE 3: Machine Learning & Advanced Quant (Months 7-9, Weeks 27-39)
phase_3_backend_engineering.description: Master machine learning for trading, advanced quantitative strategies, and high-frequency concepts.

week_61.title: Alternative Data & Quantitative Research
week_61.practice: Research and test 10 alternative data sources

week_62_63.title: High-Frequency Trading (HFT) Concepts
week_62_63.practice: Analyze order book data, simulate HFT strategies

week_70.title: Phase 3 Capstone Project
projects: PHASE 3 CAPSTONE: Machine Learning Trading Fund
Requirements: ML models, multiple strategies, portfolio optimization, transaction costs, comprehensive backtesting
Option 2: Market-neutral quant fund with factor models
Option 3: Crypto quant fund with ML and sentiment
Option 4: Options trading fund with volatility strategies
week_70.assessment: Phase 3 Exam - ML trading, advanced quant, portfolio management

phase_4_advanced_production.title: PHASE 4: Live Trading & Professional Quant (Months 10-12, Weeks 40-52)
phase_4_advanced_production.description: Master live trading deployment, infrastructure, fund management, and career development.

week_79_80.title: Live Trading Infrastructure
week_79_80.practice: Set up live trading for 5 strategies (paper trading)

week_81_82.title: Deployment & Production Systems
topics: Database for trade logging: PostgreSQL, MongoDB

week_87.title: Starting with Real Money
week_87.practice: Start live trading with small capital (optional)

week_90_91.title: Interview Preparation for Quant Roles
topics: Top quant firms and their culture

week_92_93.title: Running a Proprietary Trading Desk
topics: Setting up a prop trading desk
week_92_93.practice: Plan and document prop desk setup

week_94_95.title: Launching a Quant Hedge Fund
topics: Fee structures: management and performance fees

week_96.title: Continuous Learning & Community
topics: Contributing to open source quant projects
Building personal brand in quant finance

week_100.title: Final Capstone & Launch
projects: FINAL CAPSTONE: Professional Algorithmic Trading Business
Option 3: Algo trading as a service
Requirements: Live deployed, monitored, profitable (or promising), documented, scalable
week_100.assessment: FINAL COMPREHENSIVE EXAM - Complete algorithmic trading mastery

projects_throughout_course: Phase 1: 25+ foundational projects - data analysis, indicators, technical analysis
Phase 2: 30+ strategy projects - backtesting, optimization, various strategies
Phase 3: 25+ advanced projects - ML models, HFT, portfolio management
Phase 4: 20+ professional projects - live trading, infrastructure, business
Total: 100+ trading projects from basics to professional systems
skills_mastered: Programming: Python (expert), NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, OOP for trading
Markets: Stocks, Forex, Crypto, Options, Futures, Commodities
Technical Analysis: 50+ indicators, chart patterns, multi-timeframe analysis
Strategy Development: Momentum, mean reversion, breakout, arbitrage, options
Backtesting: Backtrader, custom frameworks, walk-forward, optimization
Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, feature engineering, NLP
Quantitative Finance: Statistics, portfolio theory, risk management, derivatives
Live Trading: Broker APIs, execution algorithms, real-time systems
Infrastructure: Cloud deployment, databases, monitoring, CI/CD
Risk Management: Position sizing, stop-loss, portfolio heat, VaR
Tools: Jupyter, Git, Docker, PostgreSQL, InfluxDB, Prometheus
Business: Fund management, compliance, investor relations, career development

support_provided.live_sessions: Weekly live trading analysis and strategy sessions
support_provided.code_review: Expert review of trading strategies and code
support_provided.data_access: Historical and real-time data for practice
support_provided.broker_support: Help with broker setup and API integration

certification.track_record: Verified backtesting and live trading results
certification.industry_recognized: Recognized by prop firms and hedge funds

prerequisites.education: No formal degree required, basic math helpful
prerequisites.trading_knowledge: Beginner-friendly, no prior trading experience needed
prerequisites.programming: No coding experience required (taught from scratch)
prerequisites.mathematics: High school math (statistics taught in course)
prerequisites.capital: Not required for learning (paper trading available)
prerequisites.equipment: Computer, internet, ~₹5000/month for data and tools

who_is_this_for.manual_traders: Want to automate their trading strategies

income_potential.hedge_fund: ₹100 LPA+ base + % of AUM + performance fees
income_potential.independent: Unlimited based on capital and strategy performance
income_potential.note: Trading income highly variable, depends on skill and capital

risk_disclaimers.trading_risk: Trading involves substantial risk of loss
risk_disclaimers.no_guarantees: Past performance does not guarantee future results
risk_disclaimers.capital_loss: You can lose all invested capital
risk_disclaimers.education_focus: This is an educational program, not financial advice
risk_disclaimers.paper_trading: Practice with paper trading before using real money
risk_disclaimers.start_small: Start with small capital when going live
risk_disclaimers.regulation: Ensure compliance with local trading regulations
risk_disclaimers.tax_implications: Consult tax professional for trading tax obligations

course_guarantees.data_access: Historical and real-time data for practice
course_guarantees.job_support: Resume review, interview prep for quant roles
course_guarantees.fund_guidance: Help starting prop desk or fund (for qualified students)
course_guarantees.code_repository: Complete code library for all projects
